price: Allah u izobilju daje opskrbu onome kome hoće od robova Svojih, a i uskraćuje kome hoće: Allah, zaista, zna sve.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu min ʿibādihi wayaqdiru lahu inna al-laha bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
